# Installation Requirements
# Installed with python setup.py install|develop
#

# Application
Flask==0.10.1
Flask-Migrate==1.2.0
Flask-Login==0.2.10
Flask-Security==1.7.1

# Forms
WTForms-Alchemy==0.12.2

# Databse
SQLAlchemy==0.9.3
psycopg2==2.5.2

# Admin
Flask-Admin==1.0.7
Flask-Gravatar==0.4.1

# Server
uWSGI==2.0.3

# Static Collection for Production
Flask-Collect==0.2.2

# Misc
pytz==2014.2
